scripts.start: if [ -n "$NODE_ENV" && "$NODE_ENV" -eq "development" ]; then nodemon -x babel-node -e js,jsx,css -i static -i node_modules/ index.js; else babel-node index.js; fi
scripts.test-browser: browserify -t coverify -t babelify test/test.js | tap-closer | smokestack -b chrome | tap-spec
scripts.test: npm run test-server && npm run test-browser
scripts.note1: we can't have nice things. prepublish also runs on npm install https://github.com/npm/npm/issues/6394 in-publish hacks around this
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && source ./scripts.sh && npm prune && npm run nsp && npm run gitPush || in-install
scripts.lint-staged: git diff --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB --cached --name-only | grep '.*\.jsx?$' | grep -v 'node_modules' | xargs eslint --ext .jsx --ext .js
scripts.dmn: dmn gen -f . && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore && git commit --no-verify -m'update npmignore'; fi
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md && if [ -f CONTRIBUTING.md ]; then doctoc CONTRIBUTING.md; fi && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add README.md CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit --no-verify -m'table of contents update'; fi
scripts.release: source ./scripts.sh && npm run requireGitClean && npm run gitPull && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm_release $@

config.notes: important to correct the path of npm so that the git hook doesn't error

ghooks.pre-push: PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc # && npm test
